channel.title: Normal RS Server?
channel.description:
Hi server owners, I'am looking for a (if possible HD-)Source wich contains the most RS features, include Quests, Skills,... - I want Just a exact Copy of the normal RS. Are there any Sources? Carlscape is a good Source, but I dont want pvp :-/ And does the Private Server include P2P Features and the GE? PS: I want to make a Server for my Friends, like a Lan-party :) And please dont add trojans, I want to play the original RS too...
Greetz from germany

item.title: Normal RS Server?
item.dc:creator: @kevinhuynh kevinhuynh
item.description:
@kevinhuynh wrote:

Thank you, but I really look for a Server, wich is a copy of the normal RS. Not Custom Content and Places. I need just a functional, normal RS. With Skilling and PvE (Player vs. Enviroment). I had seen good Servers (in the Description), but some haven’t the Features of the normal Runescape (no Equipment Screen o.O )…
Thats very sad

Read full topic
